io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels

Class PrivateChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels.Channel
      • io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels.PrivateChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChannel, ITextChannel

    public class PrivateChannel
extends Channel
implements ITextChannel
    Represents a DM Channel on discord
    Author:
    Perry Berman
